name: SBIGJam 2020 - "Best of the Worst" Collection
description:
Some said it was "impossible" to host a game jam during a pandemic. Some people said it was "impossible" to create a "So bad it's good" game in just 9 days. Some said it was "IMPOSSIBLE" to fit the top 10 games into one easy-to access collection.  

Well, if you didn't already guess, this year's modifier was "Impossible", and 10 games came out as so impossibly bad, that they made it into this special collection.

10 - "The Button Factory" by 11BelowStudio

9 - "Untitled Throw Dildos At The Dickhead Game [NSFW]" by andyman404

8 - "Freedom the Eagle" by Big Dave

7 - "Rcing is My pAsion!" by GlitchyDust

6 - "Duckgen- there is no way to win" by JOSEF

5 - "Shoddy 2D" by ItalianChurrasco

4 - "RiftBreak" by XCVG

3 - "Chazz and the Rap Band, 2" by AnarchyGames

2 - "Seven WishStones for Guidance Safety" by TenshiHanka

1 - "Bubber Bopper" by Tentabrobpy

Also, there are rumours that a cool thing might happen if you right click the big red button. If you feel like digging a bit deeper into the collection, you may want to try it!

All games are the properties of their respective owners. The collection is available for free, but donations are available. As requested by the #1 winners,  all proceeds will be donated the Black LGBTQIA+ Migrant Project.
